messages.subject: Re: Burai Sequel (stomach ache)
messages.msgSnippet: The stomach ache business was brought up when the Shinsengumi were under the command of Serizawa Kamo.  Everyone went on a boat trip, Saitou got sick they went
messages.messageBody:
The stomach ache business was brought up when the Shinsengumi were
under the command of Serizawa Kamo. Everyone went on a boat trip,
Saitou got sick they went to stay at an inn and called a doctor for
him and later the group got into a "scuffle" with sumo wrestlers.
However, I skimmed Burai, and the situation outlined was not the one I
just mentioned...the author used it as an excuse to have Okita spoil
him (not in -that- way you sickos)...at least I didn't catch anything
controversial:)

Source:http://victorian.fortunecity.com/stanford/130/bio.html
you can search for Saitou by just using the EDIT button and type in
"Saitou" to find references to him on the pages

--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "Grace Battista" <mg_batt@y...> wrote:
> Hmmm... Makes me think twice if they make such a big deal of his
> stomach ache...

messages.subject: Re: Burai Sequel
messages.msgSnippet: Hmmm... Makes me think twice if they make such a big deal of his stomach ache... Not the Saitou I KNOW... About the fudonshi, yes I remember the list talking
messages.messageBody:
Hmmm... Makes me think twice if they make such a big deal of his
stomach ache... Not the Saitou I KNOW... About the fudonshi, yes I
remember the list talking about that around a month ago... Hilarious!
I wonder where she got all her info though? I wonder how faithful
Burai is to what is true about the real Saitou... Probably far huh?

Well once I get paypal setup, I don't mind if they're just
transalations. I love collecting manga (eventhough I can't read them).

Thanks for all the info Tiffany.

messages.messageBody:
Paypal is free and easy Grace...it is also used on ebay too.

Let me be frank...the translations are OK they are not scanlations
though...in burai it mentions that Saitou washes and IRONS his fundoshi:)
and burai makes a big deal about his stomache ache
